summary: Marcus and his brother Antoine land in Argentina to celebrate their cousin's wedding and to discover the pleasures of the capital, Buenos-Aires.
cast: Nicolas Duvauchelle|Philippe Rebbot|Gustavo Kamenetzky|Paloma Contreras|Benjamin Biolay|Sarah Grappin|César Bordón|Gonzalo Suárez|Bernarda Pagés|Sofía Wilhelmi|Méroé Guillaume|Vadim Goldberg|Candela Reynoso|Alzira de Jesus|Poli Sallustro|Monique Sordre|Mario Petrillo|Cecilia Czornogas|Shu Chiutseng|Julieta Shion|Kentia Limage|Lin Luoshen|Gabriel Yoshihara|Nestor Fabian|Sebastián Montagna|Sebastián Hermams|Nizha Bustos|Thierry de Coster|Aurora Agüero Villareal|Ariel F. Erario|Fabián Luis Raul|Walkiria Lerea de la Serna|Pablo Cutipa|Kevin Duckworth|Manfred Himburg|Adrián Delgado|Mary Gerbino|Natalia Aparicio|Guido Núñez|Lise Lejeune|Graciela Arias|Marcia Cutipa|Alexia Marilu Barros|Gabriel Ruiz|Federico Geletti|Rodrigo Marquez|Payo Saravia|Nicolas Kishimoto|Jaynne Anne|Yann Rebondy|Magdalena García Baggi|Miguel Angel Lavaglia|Esther Fidela Martinez|Violeta Kreimer|Edouard Deluc|Valérie Pilate|Francisco Moris
title: Boda en Mendoza
